```lisp
[
(:action stay
    :parameters (?npc - npc ?food - object)
    :precondition (and (separate ?food) (bare ?npc))
    :effect (and (mixed ?food) (camouflaged ?npc) (safe ?npc) (not (venturing ?npc)))
),
(:action get
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (available ?agent) (accessible ?item))
    :effect (and (possessed ?agent ?item) (not (accessible ?item)))
)
]
```
